description: The slow cooker delivers juicy and delicious honey mustard chicken legs with very little effort.
keywords: Juicy Slow Cooked Honey Mustard Chicken
name: Juicy Slow Cooked Honey Mustard Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the stock, mustard and honey and cook on low for 4.5 hours. Stir in the creme fraiche and cook for 10 minutes uncovered. Scatter over the parsley and serve.
Add the stock, mustard and honey and cook on low for 4.5 hours. Stir in the creme fraiche and cook for 10 minutes uncovered. Scatter over the parsley and serve.
